item.title: Why We Write <!DOCTYPE html> ?
item.description: Yes, this is for the absolute beginner, and also for those non-beginners who forgot. I am going to look back behinds and re-discover things we take as granted by asking “WHAT”, “WHY”, and “HOW”. <!DOCTYPE html> <html lang="en"> <head></head> <body></body> </html> <! DOCTYPE html> is the first html tag written at the beginning of any html file. It is not an element and doesn’t has content or closing tag.
